info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-omp-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions for
     the operational data of Overlay Management Protocol (OMP).
     Copyright (c) 2024 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 9

get.description: The operational data of Overlay Management Protocol (OMP)
The operational data of layer2 services (collection)
The operational data of layer2 services
The operational data of layer2 routes (collection)
The operational data of layer2 routes
The operational data of layer2 services (collection)
The operational data of layer2 services
The operational data of layer2 routes (collection)
The operational data of layer2 routes

vpn-id.description: The layer2 VPN ID of a layer2 route entry

service.description: The service type of a layer2 service entry

vc-id.description: Virtual circuit ID of a layer2 route entry

site-id.description: The site ID of a layer2 route entry

from-peer.description: The remote peer of a received layer2 route entry. A special IP 0.0.0.0 means this peer is the local device itself.

path-id.description: The path index of a received layer2 route entry

label.description: The downstream SDWAN MPLS label ID of a received layer2 route entry

status.description: RIB status of a received layer2 route entry

loss-reason.description: The loss reason for failure competition among multi received paths of a same layer2 route entry

lost-to-peer.description: The lost to peer IP address for failure competition among multi received paths of a same layer2 route entry

lost-to-path-id.description: The lost to path index for failure competition among multi received paths of a same layer2 route entry

orig.description: The originator's IP address of a layer2 route entry

remote-site-id.description: The remote site ID of a received layer2 route entry. It is only valid when vpn-type is p2p.

to-peer.description: The IP address of a remote peer that a layer2 route entry is advertised to.

vpn-type.description: The layer2 VPN type of a layer2 route entry

route-type.description: The route type of a layer2 route entry

mac.description: A host's MAC address of a layer2 route entry.

ip.description: A host's IP address of a layer2 route entry

vpn-id.description: The layer2 VPN ID of a layer2 service entry
